title: arm trajectory topic seems to skip or ignore msgs

content.raw: Control of the arms via the topic /ihmc_ros/valkyrie/control/arm_trajectory will occasionally ignore a new trajectory message. Seems to be for both arms. I can echo and see the messages being published with the desired joint trajectories in the correct order. It may take multiple publishes of the same data for the arm to finally move.
content.html: Control of the arms via the topic /ihmc_ros/valkyrie/control/arm_trajectory will occasionally ignore a new trajectory message. Seems to be for both arms. I can echo and see the messages being published with the desired joint trajectories in the correct order. It may take multiple publishes of the same data for the arm to finally move.
